revision.text: {{also|yautía}} ==English== [[File:Xanthosoma sagittifolium.jpg|thumb]] ===Alternative forms=== * [[yautía]] {{qualifier|Spanish-influenced}} ===Etymology=== Via {{cog|es|-}}, from {{der|en|tnq}} or {{der|en|arw}}. ===Noun=== {{en-noun}} # An [[edible]] [[plant]] commonly found in the [[Caribbean]]: ''[[Xanthosoma sagittifolium]]'', [[new cocoyam]]. ====Synonyms==== * [[cocoyam]] {{qualifier|see that entry for more}} ====Translations==== {{trans-see|cocoyam}} ===See also=== * [[old cocoyam]] ===Further reading=== * {{pedia|Xanthosoma sagittifolium|i=1}} [[Category:en:Arum family plants]] [[Category:en:Vegetables]] [[Category:en:Root vegetables]]
